attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for your (no) votes and opinions on should past conviction be brought up in a court of law. As I feel people with past conviction and have been punish and if there past conviction was brought up in a court of law then it would not be a fair trial
As I was advise by my barrister because of my past conviction 20 odd years ago to go guilty
